name: WWE 2K19 - Rising Stars
detailed_description:
The bright future of WWE is on display in the WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack! Play as some of WWE’s imminent Superstars, such as Ricochet, Lio Rush, Candice LeRae, Lacey Evans & more!

The WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack is also available by downloading the WWE 2K19 Season Pass.
about_the_game:
The bright future of WWE is on display in the WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack! Play as some of WWE’s imminent Superstars, such as Ricochet, Lio Rush, Candice LeRae, Lacey Evans & more!

The WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack is also available by downloading the WWE 2K19 Season Pass.
short_description: The bright future of WWE is on display in the WWE 2K19 Rising Stars Pack! Play as some of WWE’s imminent Superstars, such as Ricochet, Lio Rush, Candice LeRae, Lacey Evans & more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit: Windows® 7 (latest updates)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 2 GB DDR Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit: Windows® 7, Windows® 8 (8.1) or Windows® 10 (latest updates)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
